description:
Hello There, My name is Gavin Davies and I take a very wide interest in Economics and Business Studies. When I started learning Economics lots of very complicated terms were thrown into my face and I was expected to understand them further. I needed a resource that would teach me all of the basic concepts before I dived deeper into each one. This is why I have created this course, to try and help people who are in that position.

The course is only 30 minutes long and includes all that is needed to start learning economics quickly and easily.
title: Your First 30 Minutes in Economics
